mapper.select:
SELECT postsComments.id, postsComments.content, authUser.name authorName , authUser.avatar authorAvatar, parentAuthUser.name parentUserName, posts.title FROM plumemo_posts_comments postsComments LEFT JOIN plumemo_auth_user authUser ON postsComments.author_id = authUser.id LEFT JOIN plumemo_posts_comments parentPostsComments ON postsComments.parent_id = parentPostsComments.id LEFT JOIN plumemo_auth_user parentAuthUser ON parentPostsComments.author_id = parentAuthUser.id LEFT JOIN plumemo_posts posts ON posts.id = postsComments.posts_id
( postsComments.content LIKE #{postsComments.keywords} OR posts.title LIKE #{postsComments.keywords} )
and postsComments.id=#{postsComments.id}
ORDER BY postsComments.create_time DESC
